txt.en: 'You say these goblins appear to be wild? That may explain why they have become as they are, seeming more like to men than to Orc-kind.\n\n'They have some small strength, you say? But you survived their village alone, so I am sure they will pose no significant threat to the Grey Company.'
Goblins of Enedwaith
You have reached the first patrol point
'I have not seen the like of these goblins before...these must be the bugan that the Algraig have spoken of in the past.'
You have reached the second patrol point
'I have not seen the like of these goblins before...these must be the bugan that the Algraig have spoken of in the past.'
You have reached the third patrol point

The gate to the goblin-village lies to the south-east of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nIdhrenfair has asked you to scout the goblin-village you discovered while patrolling the Gloomglens to determine its strength and to whom its inhabitants owe allegiance.
'I have not seen the like of these goblins before...these must be the bugan that the Algraig have spoken of in the past.'
These goblins appear to be wild, owing allegiance to no one
The goblin-village lies to the south-east of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nYou should continue deeper into the goblin-village.
'I have not seen the like of these goblins before...these must be the bugan that the Algraig have spoken of in the past.'
TBD
The goblin-village lies to the south-east of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nYou should continue deeper into the goblin-village.
The goblin-village lies to the south-east of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nYou should continue deeper into the goblin-village.
Idhrenfair is at Echad Idhrenfair, north-west of the goblin-village.\n\nYou should return to Idhrenfair with tidings of what you have learned.
Return to the gate of the goblin-village
Go to the second patrol point
Go to the third patrol point
Go to the fourth patrol point
Talk to Idhrenfair at Echad Idhrenfair
TBD
Your discovery of a strange breed of goblin in the Gloomglens is a source of concern to the Ranger Idhrenfair.

'The goblin-village you discovered is very much a source of concern for me, [placeholder]. Goblins of any breed are servants of the Enemy and pose a threat to the secrecy of our quest. However, if these creatures are outcasts, it may be that they will pay us no mind, beyond seeking our lives.

'I would like you to return to the village and learn what you can of the goblins. I would like to know what their strength is and to whom they owe allegiance.

'Be careful, friend, for you may have to travel to the deepest reaches of their village.'
